climatePledgeFriendly.details: GreenCircle Certified: Certified Energy Savings verifies product energy savings of over 10% in the use-phase compared to similar products.

features: Innovative liquid detergent technology gets between the fibers to clean hidden dirt
Designed with 10 concentrated cleaning actives to remove visible and invisible
Provides a deep, hygienic clean even in case of tough stains
Works in all machines and water conditions
Try Tide Power PODS for 50% more cleaning power vs. Tide Original Liquid
body.description: Everything leaves a trace on your clothes - from what you eat, to where you go, to what you do. But more often than not, the dirt residue and the body soils left on your garments aren't necessarily visible and just because you can't see it, doesn't mean it isn't there. Designed to clean fabrics down to the microscopic level, Tide Hygienic Clean Heavy 10x Duty liquid laundry detergent removes both visible and invisible dirt from your garments, giving you a clean you can trust.Containing 10 concentrated cleaning actives, Tide Heavy Duty Hygienic Clean is not only the #1 Stain and Odor Fighter detergent*, it also gets between fibers to clean hidden dirt you didn't even know was there.Available in Tide's beloved Original scent that infuses your loads of laundry with floral and fruity notes.In times of great uncertainty, get a clean you can be certain about: Get a Tide Heavy Duty Hygienic Clean! *among liquid laundry detergents

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Tide of them All
reviews.reviewText: My daughter and grandson are very sensitive to smells. Certain odors spike migraines in my daughter, but not the smell of original Tide. Neither can tolerate the Tide choices that have other odors such as lavender or lemon. So we all use Hygienic clean Tide. It cleans great and has the original scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Love This Detergent
reviews.reviewText: I was washing clothes with a regular laundry detergent and adding Clorox to the wash to disinfect. But this tide product is great and does not irritate sensitive skin. It seems to disinfect the clothes without the need to add harsh chemicals. I only use this product to wash my clothes now. I have really sensitive skin and this product does not irritate my skin at all. I highly recommend it !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good detergent, but…
reviews.reviewText: I like the detergent…but, in the last order, the top was not taped down, it came loose and all other items in the subscription order box were covered in detergent. I am not going to order it again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells great, and very stong. About a tablespoon for a basic load is all you need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tried others, always come back.
reviews.reviewText: I only have to use half the recommended amount to get my clothes looking, feeling and smelling their best. 10 out of 10 DO recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST PRODUCT OUT THERE FOR STAINS A MUST HAVE!!
reviews.reviewText: If you find this helpful please click the helpful button below :)I agree with the original review reposted below.I have actually tried persil and I do not prefer its scent and for some reason whenever I use it, one of my family member’s allergies acts up.I have been using Tide for decades and have tried just about every other brand out there..I average a 3 load weekend which is when we do the laundry. And everything from whites to colors to delicate fabrics retain their bright colors and there is no damage to delicates.Tide is the clear winner based on value and performance for value..For whatever reason, nothing beats Tide and the Tide stain remover stick for stains. I thin they use some enzyme formula that really seams to work!I don’t use the powder or PODS as a couple times they only partially dissolved and the powder seems to gunk up my washer lint filter. The liquid is the best for me!I also like the spout as it is dribble proof.Possible modifications: . Change out the design of the container..to fun seasonal colors.ORIGINAL REVIEWUpdated review November 19, 2003:The ONLY detergent that gets out tough stains better than this stuff is Persil. And the difference is very very very small. So small I miight even be just umagining there is a difference when there is none really. I have seen a study that said Persil is 2% better so, I might be influenced by that study. Tide is the clear winner based on value and performance for value..Original July 29 review:The container I received is about 3/4 full.OK, so I've used Tide PODS for a long time and I admit this is the first time I've ever bought the liquid jug. So, maybe the jug is supposed to come 3/4 full. But if that is so, it's a waste of plastic, since its not like a powdered product which "settles" during shipping..I average 4.5 loads a week. So, this Tide should last me somewhere between 8 to 16 weeks. Again, I am keeping a log. I will come back and update this message when the container is finished.For Sensitive Skin: 5I've never had a problem with Tide, nor has anybody I've ever known.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: has become my go-to laundry detergent. It combines powerful cleaning with fabric care, is gentle on the skin, and aligns with my environmental values. I couldn't be happier with its performance, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for an effective and eco-friendly laundry solution.
